item.title: Cantor, Tether-Backed Twenty One Increases Bitcoin Holdings
item.description: Twenty One Capital Inc., the Bitcoin treasury company launched by an affiliate of Cantor Fitzgerald LP, stablecoin issuer Tether Holdings SA and SoftBank Group, is increasing its holdings of the crypt
